00006 from httplib2.test import miniserver

00008 
00009 class HttpSmokeTest(unittest.TestCase):
00010     def setUp(self):
00011         self.httpd, self.port = miniserver.start_server(
00012             miniserver.ThisDirHandler)
00013 
00014     def tearDown(self):
00015         self.httpd.shutdown()
00016 
00017     def testGetFile(self):
00018         client = httplib2.Http()
00019         src = 'miniserver.py'
00020         response, body = client.request('http://localhost:%d/%s' %
00021                                         (self.port, src))
00022         self.assertEqual(response.status, 200)
00023         self.assertEqual(body, open(os.path.join(miniserver.HERE, src)).read())
